mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agency_certification( id, name, id_number, legal_person_name, legal_person_id_card_no, business_license, certification_status, certification_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{idNumber}, #{legalPersonName}, #{legalPersonIdCardNo}, #{businessLicense}, #{certificationStatus}, #{certificationTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), id_number = VALUES(id_number), legal_person_name = VALUES(legal_person_name), legal_person_id_card_no = VALUES(legal_person_id_card_no), business_license = VALUES(business_license), certification_status = VALUES(certification_status), certification_time = VALUES(certification_time)
